        var mvb = cameraMatrix[1];
        var mvc = cameraMatrix[2];
        var mvd = cameraMatrix[3];
        var mve = cameraMatrix[4];
        var mvf = cameraMatrix[5];

        get: function ()

    centerX: {

        get: function ()

            return this.x + (0.5 * this.width);
